website_summaries.verdict: This nearly professional-grade juicer is a great pick for buyers seeking a quality product at a cheaper cost.
pros: Crafted from high-quality cast iron and stainless steel
Heavy base and suction feet keeps product from moving when in use
cons: Some buyers had trouble with the product tipping forward when pushing the handle down

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not durable
customer_reviews.text: As an inspector in the auto, aircraft & industrial fields, the juicer looked over engineered. It worked real smooth. The only problem arose after squeezing 30 lemons. The main support shaft to base would not remain tight. The screw holding the two together kept backing out making for a very wobbly vertical assembly. Apparently the shaft and the base hole that the shaft fits into are not even close to the same diameter. It should have been a press fit but that won’t work either because the cast iron base would eventually fracture from the forcing of the solid steel bar into it. 3 Stars- looks good but not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Blind

customer_reviews.title: Great for high volume.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for juicing. You get all the juice possible out of whatever (citrus) fruit you are using, and you can very quickly get though large quantities. I made one liter of fresh lime juice in 3 minutes. The only con is that you need to keep it clean after every use, otherwise we're talking oil buildup, possible mold, and fruit flies. The dual-lever action is superior to rack and pinion. The base is cast iron and the thing won't move or tip on you. I use it every weekend to make enough juice for a week and store it in mason jars in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: B. Veronico

customer_reviews.title: For sturdy professionals only
customer_reviews.text: Although the press works as intended, the product is marred by quality issues that make it unsuitable as a gift. The holes in the spine pole are not drilled in the same direction, so it's noticeably crooked when looking from the top. The packaging by New Star is woefully inadequate, so the handle ripped a hole in the box. And finally, the feet are not extending forward far enough, so one cannot just pull the handle without having the whole thing tip forward. As a result, operating the press requires a significant dexterity, despite its heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Zaitcev

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the only reason I didn't give it that ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have fresh squeezed orange juice. Works great, the only reason I didn't give it that final star is because it doesn't balance that well. When you push down to squeeze a fruit it falls forward unless you hold the back with another hand. Not that big of a deal, but I've used other hand juicers and that wasn't a problem. I kept it anyway because the price was good, it looks nice, and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Shelton

customer_reviews.title: I've had flimsy / cheaper ones in the past that are good for, say
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously heavy & impressive juicer. I've had flimsy / cheaper ones in the past that are good for, say, an over-ripe orange but that couldn't begin to juice a small lemon or a normal lime. This juicer squashes fruit flat and gets an impressive amount of juice out of even really firm citrus. (I got a quarter cup from one average-sized lime last night.) The built in strainer cup catches all seeds but does let some pulp through (which is what I prefer), and all parts come apart for easy cleaning. Margarita night is way easier now than it once was.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is easy to clean which means I use it all the time. The only negative I have is that the sides of the bottom funnel cup could be a little deeper. When you first start squeezing a lemon, some of the juice squirts out over the cup onto the counter. Be prepared to occasionally tighten the Allen screws. No big deal just preventive maintenance. Craftsmanship is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Miller

customer_reviews.title: Handle is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This product handle is dangerous. Doesn't stay in the upright position. Falls and knocked me in the face a couple of times. I thought my glasses broke! Very heavy handle. It does make squeezing the juice easier but be really careful with the handle. Knock you in the head pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: lilia

customer_reviews.title: Could be better BUT....
customer_reviews.text: This juice press could be better if they improve the following problems. First, although the base and the filter are large, the top/press cone is small. You can't effectively press medium or large grapefruits or pomegranates. If the top/press cone is slightly larger, it would allow juicing of larger fruit. Second, the hex screws are always coming loose. I have to tighten them after every use. Other than these two problems or nuisance, this is a decent juice press.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Feet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent press for larger fruit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a larger press that can handle pomelo grapefruits which are larger and have thicker skins than regular grapefruit. This fits the bill perfectly. The cup is 4.5” (11.4cm) across which is fine for most of my fruit. The length of the lever makes it very easy to press. It does require a second hand to steady the base otherwise the machine can tip forwards.
customer_reviews.author: KingBoy

customer_reviews.title: manual juicer
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and good material. however, the handle/press system is VERY dangerous. after using it for awhile, the handle will slam down onto the juicing screen/cup. it happens fast and forceful since the material is cast iron. twice it slammed on to hands and fingers. tightening and re tightening will not resolve the issue. as a matter of fact, the tightening actually puts pressure on the screw able squeeze cup so that the unscrewing becomes tight. had this equipment since this past august.
customer_reviews.author: chakli diggs

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this product after a few glaring issues. 1) Due to a lack of suction cups, you have to hold the base while pressing fruit. 2) While loading in fruit, the handle falls down, which is quite heavy, so you have to hold on to it while positioning the fruit with the other hand. 3) aesthetically, the finish is quite ugly, not as pictured, it looks very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent product! I used to hand squeeze lemons and limes and once I used this product, I kicked myself for not purchasing one earlier. Easy to use and is very efficient at extracting all the possible juice from the fruit you squeeze. Taking it apart and cleaning is very easy and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: RMH

customer_reviews.title: Low quality components
customer_reviews.text: Low quality material. While the base is steel, the bolts are plastic. I have used this press for 2 years. I have watched it breakdown slowly over time. I have owned industrial grade presses before and they do not wear down over time like this. I am glad it finally failed so I can replace it with a professional model.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Relatively sturdy, easy enough to use, and easy to clean. Only complaint is that it's not balanced well... when you pull the handle to crush fruit, you must put opposing pressure on the back of the machine to keep it from falling over. A better design would put more weight on the back of the machine to counter the handle pull. Suspect similar size models suffer from this problem as well. Overall a good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: emmcd

customer_reviews.title: Your going to have to hold this thing down with ...
customer_reviews.text: Your going to have to hold this thing down with one hand while you squeeze your citrus. The addition of some suction cups at the base would have solved this problem relatively inexpensively. Not sure why this wasn't considered or included as an option.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: This item broke about 3 weeks after purchase. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This item broke about 3 weeks after purchase. I purchased an Asurion warranty with the product but have been unsuccessful in using the warranty to replace broken product. Do not purchase this item if you intend to use it a lot. We juice citrus with this on a daily basis and it only lasted a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We've processed over 10 gallons worth of jucie with it over the last year and it's held up well. The one thing that I don't like about it is that when the handle is in the upright position, it tends to fall down if you let go of it. It's an easy way to get your fingers smashed so be careful. Overall I'm happy that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best item I have bought in years
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best item I have bought in years, I just put up 222 quarts of fresh grapefruit juice and 212 quarts of fresh orange juice, that I didn't have to peel each grapefruit and orange and strip all the white inner skin off to use my old juicer , a Jack Lalanne, with it every piece of fruit had to be peeled and with this one all I have to do is cut them in half and juice them, so it has saved me so much time and hard work, and is sooooooooooooo much easier and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GLENN STEWART

customer_reviews.title: great juicer
customer_reviews.text: works very well- gets all the juice out., seeds in, a little pulp the only problem we have is that if a small or weak person tries to use both hands on the lever, the back end of the juicer lifts up.
customer_reviews.author: a vid reader

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed when I opened it at how heavy it felt and the first use was great. After the fourth use, the cone used to press on the fruit broke where it screws into the press. Then a bolt popped off the sides. Additionally, it is not stable on the counter and requires support with one hand while pressing with the other. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: rendering it useless. The metal conical piece that screws into the ...
customer_reviews.text: The top half of the juicer broke within the first month of using it, rendering it useless. The metal conical piece that screws into the top was poorly designed as two separate parts glued or welded together. Whatever was holding the threading in failed and it became detached from the cone, so that it can no longer be screwed onto the press.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for juicing pomegranates!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for juicing pomegranates from my tree quickly! I will never spend hours picking pomegranate seeds again! Very sturdy, heavy, well made machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. I am a casual user, and this thing is awesome. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Rosangela Canino Koning

customer_reviews.title: Top part doesn't screw
customer_reviews.text: The top part doesn't screw anymore, it's been 2 months only:( very disappointed. It does make great juice, but now useless
customer_reviews.author: Samy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. It does the job, making squeezing oranges relatively easy. It is a little heavy, but it has to be to do the job right. You won't be disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard  Appel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty durable. Learning curve. Very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Tips over when you pull down unless you hold the back. Over time the top part of the two squeezing plates begins to separate and a little juice squeezes through. Not a huge deal but worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: LapinSangSue

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Best lemonade ever! This juicer is heavy duty and works great. Now I have fresh lemonade, grapefruit juice and limeade whenever I want. So easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ladeeda

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I received it this morning and used it right away. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Gembicki

customer_reviews.title: I really love the ones that bolt in
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these forever. I really love the ones that bolt in, but don't really have the dedicated real estate for that, so this is a great alternative. Very heavy duty and extracts every last drop out of your citrus.
customer_reviews.author: Jencz

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it is a little low
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty and well built! just wish where you put your glass to collect what you have squeezed was a little taller. It seems like it is a little low.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy - can see this lasting a long time!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a juicer, buy this one. I use it on limes and lemons weekly and it does an excellent job. Very sturdy and well built. PLus, the metal pieces separate for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: T. Westerhof

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with the quality of tis product. I mostly use it for orange juice. I keep an allen wrench near by, because I often have to tighten some of the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Winks

customer_reviews.title: Increase juice from small oranges
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on grapefruit. Would like to see manufacturer offer an extra cup and/or strainer for small diameter oranges. I placed a sponge (encased in mesh) on top of my oranges and it helps extract more juice. When handle starts dropping by itself, use an Allen wrench to tighten loose parts. Large handle makes it easy to squeeze out the juice. Suggestion to place a small zip lock bag over the cup is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martin

customer_reviews.title: I is soooo easy to make lemonade with this
customer_reviews.text: I got 2oz of juice from each lemon! I is soooo easy to make lemonade with this. The only issue I found is that it does nit start in open position unless I hold handle up, but wieght ilof the level is what part of what makes this citrus jucier work so well. Very easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home
customer_reviews.text: This has already been put to use many times in our house, including a party where we made about 15-20. It works really well and clean-up is simple. I’d definitely recommend it. The reason it’s not 4 Stars is that if you’re expecting commercial grade this isn’t quite that heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.S.

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a commercial (manual) squeeze. Works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper101

customer_reviews.title: The best citrus squeezer
customer_reviews.text: The best citrus squeezer! We bought several automatic ones (they were cheaper ones), and they all broke. No need to try other kinds, go straight to this one.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Good, hold the bottom when you use it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and juices citrus well. It is top heavy and when you press down it wants to topple over. Hold the bottom when you push down and it will be fine. Wish it was more weighted in the bottom or manufacturer fixes this.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Murdock

customer_reviews.title: if you like fresh squeezed buy this.
customer_reviews.text: this is the best juicer ever works quite well and cleanup is easy we bought it several months ago and have probably juiced 30 or 40 lbs of oranges the kids and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for most oranges
customer_reviews.text: works OK. on a large citrus, some of the flesh will NOT stay under the press and won't get juice extracted. Its heavily made and works with most quite well. The screws often work loose and need tightening
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Had for more than a year, use in commercial setting, gets plenty of use. Still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get fresh juice
customer_reviews.text: Love that it makes it so easy and fast to make fresh orange juice. Just one press to squeeze all the juice from the orange. Ordered another as a gift to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JNB

customer_reviews.title: Has a good press base that does not split the orange peel
customer_reviews.text: Has a good press base that does not split the orange peel. This means the juice is less bitter/oily. However, this model does not have the suction cup base like other models and it shifts when squeezing. So, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: EHBiker

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty wel.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Heavy and will last it seems. Glad I bought it and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: a very handy juicer.
customer_reviews.text: this thing doesn't just squeeze fruit it crushes fruit! even the seeds. i'm sure I could adjust it but i'll just strain the juice at the end to get all the fragments of crushed seeds out. it produces a surprising amount of juice.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin R. Stiff, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing around for juicing lemons. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: DR. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It is amazing. So little pressure equals so much juice. It is easy to clean. Our son-in-law was so impressed he ordered one for his dad. Absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Irish513

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Repair/Replace Policy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing. The product arrived and worked great about 15 times. However, a small part that screws into the cone broke. I contacted the company and they quickly replaced the ENTIRE unit with a brand new one. WOW. That is customer service. Juice on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E

customer_reviews.title: The juice from the fruit would squirt out of the crack as a fine mist. I checked the reviews and this appears ...
customer_reviews.text: We only had the press for one week and the top portion where the fruit is squeezed cracked. The juice from the fruit would squirt out of the crack as a fine mist. I checked the reviews and this appears to be a common problem. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I can now squeeze out all the lemon juice from the lemons
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It takes the stress off my wrists and works really well on any size oranges, lemons or limes - I haven't tried grapefruit. I read a review that it wasn't great for smaller citrus, but I have not had any problem - even with limes the size of walnuts. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the product. Easy to clean and very effective. Squeezes almost 100% of the liquid in the fruit. My kids love it. We tend to buy fresh fruit more now than orange juice since we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbankol

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price and wonder what we did ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning for orange and lemon juice and we break it out when we make marguritas with fresh lime. Excellent quality for the price and wonder what we did without it!!
customer_reviews.author: clarkandco

customer_reviews.title: works great! I also noticed after a few uses the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it has the suction cups on the bottom so it doesn't fall forward when I'm using it. Other then that, works great! I also noticed after a few uses the pull down bar you use to press the juice loosened and it falls down easily. I think i just need to tighten the screws to fix!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. I am satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected. Solid package. Heavy yet I have to hold the bottom down when I press all the way down to keep it stable, but that is to be expected. For that much force, the item has to be rooted down to the table to not topple over. Good buy. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: Cone broke after around 10 uses...
customer_reviews.text: A nice Christmas gift, this thing was an awesome juicer until the cone broke where it screws into the press. Now it is useless. Looking for manufacturer information to see if we can find a replacement part but no luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mother with carpal tunnel- works great for her
customer_reviews.author: msharpe4

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC POM'EGRANATE JUICER
customer_reviews.text: Terrific for pomegranate's. Just slice your pomegranate in half and squeeze. Easy to use, clean, sturdy & compact. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to Our Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. Making much more juice these days. Love it better than any mechanized juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, so happy I bought it. It's very heavy and sturdy, very easy to use. Easy to take apart and clean. No difference noted between larger oranges and small limes.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves it! She squeezes lemons and pomegranates. Works extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It is a lot heavier and bigger than I thought but I prefer it that way. It took 45 seconds to unwind the parts to clean. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: A little better care could have been taken in the protective coat ...
customer_reviews.text: Product performs well. A little better care could have been taken in the protective coat of (polyurethane?). Could use a tool to assist grabbing staining cone during disassembly. True test will be that of time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Totally pleased. In fact beyond expectation
customer_reviews.text: Totally pleased. In fact beyond expectation. I went to Bowery restaurant equipment stores and found the same press for more money and because of the difference in price. I was concern whether the one I got would be as good. It turned out to be the same exact one and I was very pleased. I use it 3 days out of the week every week. I love fresh orange and grapefruit juice. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juice Press
customer_reviews.text: I love mine had viewed this item for a while before I ordered. I have had it for a few weeks and use it mainly for fresh orange juice. You do have to hold it when squeezing oranges to prevent tipping. It is perfect for inhome use and it is stored on the counter and does not take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: jejexey

customer_reviews.title: Not cool for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the screws come loose after just a few uses. Had to use my own lock tight to keep them from loosening up. When the screws loosen the handle will drop and hit you in the head. Not cool for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Fast, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of different juicers from the old Hamilton Beach gear driven press, electric juicers, and handhelds. This is by far the best, fastest, easiest to clean, and most powerful juicer I have ever owned. The amount of force you can use with the cam/lever mechanism is far superior to the old gear driven juicer that look similar. It has a vintage look and it is very heavy, but compact enough to fit under my cabinets. I chose this one over the other one because it has a removable top press that is dishwasher safe. Completely satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LA Salt

customer_reviews.title: Much better than electric!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Alot better than our previous electric machines.
customer_reviews.author: Dov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to store. We are eating citrus out of the yard again!
customer_reviews.author: atyk2018

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a friend and it is in her working kitchen and used practically daily! Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. hold down back of unit when levering arm. read all instructions re: maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: ftv

customer_reviews.title: this works very well; you may have to tighten ...
customer_reviews.text: this works very well; you may have to tighten up the allen nuts with an allen wrench from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: VINCE

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The screws come loose all the time. Requires to be tightened always.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Jabini

customer_reviews.title: We have used it several times and it seems pretty great. Really squeezes all the juice out of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used it several times and it seems pretty great. Really squeezes all the juice out of grapefruits with only a little pulp left. Seems very heavy duty which is great because there is a lot of stress on many of the pieces. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C Dillahunty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy juicer and I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: LuAnn Knoedler

customer_reviews.title: I hate
customer_reviews.text: When I juice it it doesn’t come out until the end, and there is a lot of residue
customer_reviews.author: Hyerin Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great! only a simple mind would give it a 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everytime you squeeze the unit moves, not a steady base cosidering its weight.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn P.

customer_reviews.title: great product, but the joints and shaft needed lubrication
customer_reviews.text: great product, but the joints and shaft needed lubrication. this is the second one i've had, and this one is quite difficult to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Joanzino

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the transport price. It doubled the price of the whole thing ! I ordered 2 garden chairs from China, the cost to Europe is 7$/piece !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ovidiu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Lubricate hinge points with cooking spray and it works even better.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Bolts always loosen
customer_reviews.text: I got a replacement for one that came broken but they both seem to have a common problem where when used the bolts loosen up so they have to be tighten after each time they are used which is very inconvenient but other then that it's great
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: fast and super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very easy to use. Clean up in less than a minute. Much easier than the powered inventions.
customer_reviews.author: dave moore

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Great device. I have now bought 2 .... one for home and one for our vacation home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great - gets every last drop out of the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Orange crusher
customer_reviews.text: The holes in the strainer are just a little big, too much pulp slips through. It gets the job done for my needs, but moving forward, I would spend the extra money and upgrade to a better machine.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schepens

customer_reviews.title: It was a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and easy to clean, the best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam L.

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was the Amazon recommended juicer but the craftsmanship is pretty shoddy. The finish started chipping within a few days of arrival and the parts are extremely loose, requiring tightening every week or so. I typically juice a grapefruit in the morning so this shouldn't be too much for the unit to handle. Lastly, the cup that compresses the top of the fruit has a small metal plug on the inside which came out a few days ago. Now juice comes out the top of that cup as I'm pressing the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very large but works like a charm for squeezing lemons for our "favorite" health drink.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Cermak

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality could be better on the juicing parts but the structure itself is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: G. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Squeeze fresh orange juice whenever orange is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Squeeze fresh orange juice whenever orange is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Dat Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Bolts need regular tightening and shaft ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Bolts need regular tightening and shaft requires regular lubrication but solid construction should keep this thing working for a while with proper, minimal maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: 5dayweekend

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This is a really good machine to make home made Orange Juice :)
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Good juicer, very sturdily made. Keep an allen wrench handy as the handle loosens up over time. Not a biggie. This happened after juicing two Costco bags of oranges and 2 dozen limes...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful product to have especially for those who love pure ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful product to have especially for those who love pure orange/grapefruit/ pomegranate juice. Very good manual juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Erwin G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy pies of equipment. Easy to clean. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: jumboFiatco

customer_reviews.title: I find that squeezing grapefruits and oranges manually is the best tasting juice
customer_reviews.text: instead of that rine taste one of those juice machines would give you, I find that squeezing grapefruits and oranges manually is the best tasting juice. My wife and i fill a 5-gal bucket with grapefruits and oranges, slice them and squeeze them, and end up with 2 gallons of good tasting juice for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Clark

customer_reviews.title: a FAKE OrangeX clone
customer_reviews.text: A clever FAKE. We own an OrangeX juicer, it is a hunk of solid metal that makes pressing OJ a joy. This is a FAKE, designed to ape the OrangeX. It doesn't have the same weight. It is not stable, when you pull the lever down it tips toward you. Some of the parts are roughly machined, such as the cup insert which had sharp edges. It is half the price and well, to be fair, exactly half the usefulness. To this day, can't believe I bought it, it's just that the picture was UTTERLY similar, should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Backer

customer_reviews.title: They love it and use it on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister for christmas so I don't use it often, but they live nearby and we go over for orange crushes often. They love it and use it on a regular basis. I always hear there comments about how much juice you get out of t he citrus and how easy the press is to clean. It's very heavy and sturdy. You can tell it is something that was made to last for years and years. All of the bars in my neighborhood have similar (if not the same exact) looking juicers to make crushes and they seem to hold up with constant use year over year. I highly recommend this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Danny A

customer_reviews.title: No replacement parts available
customer_reviews.text: The inside arms start to bend over time and the screws loosen up. The arms bend enough from larger lemons that smaller one no longer get squeezed well. I straightened the arms in a vice once. The second time I had to do this, one of the cast iron arms broke and the other cracked. I've not been able to find anyone offering replacement parts. Mine lasted one year of daily use squeezing 1-2 lemons daily.
customer_reviews.author: Citsirose

product_meta.title: New Star Foodservice 46878 Commercial Citrus Juicer, Enameled Black
feature_bullets: Professional-quality juicer in black, made of cast iron and 18/8 stainless steel
Ergonomic rubberized handle will withstand 2, 300 PSI (pounds per square inch)
Great for squeezing the most juice possible out of oranges, grapefruits, lemons, limes, and more
Heavy base with suction feet for greater stability and Longer handle for additional leverage
Detachable cone and Funnel parts are dishwasher safe
